description:
Luffy tries to enhance his Haki to foresee Katakuri’s next move but Katakuri’s attacks keep pulling him down! However, when he summons every bit of wisdom from his training with Rayleigh, he remembers something important that could turn the tables for him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !توجيهات ملك الظلام المباشرة! تنقلب المعركة ضدّ كاتاكوري
Dark King`s Direct Precepts! The Battle Against Katakuri Turns Around!
Die Anweisungen des dunklen Königs – Der Wendepunkt im Kampf gegen Katakuri
Les préceptes du seigneur des ténèbres. Renversement de situation contre Katakuri
Meiou Jikiden: Katakuri Sen Dai Gyakuten Kaishi
Наставления Тёмного Рыцаря. Реванш в битве с Катакури!
冥王直伝 カタクリ戦大逆転開始
